translation: n.平均数；平均水平adj.平均的；一般的；通常的v.取平均值；达到平均水平
examples: (1) The average of 4,6 and 8 is 6.(2) Temperatures are below average for the time of year.(3) The average age of the boys in this class is fifteen.(4) Tom's work at school is above the average.(5) He is an average man, there's nothing special about him.(6) If you average 4, 6 and 11,you get 7 .(7) Meals average out at 5 per head.
(1) 4,6, 8的平均数是6。(2) 温度低于此时的年平均温度。(3) 本班男生的平均年龄是十五岁。(4) 汤姆的功课是中上等水平。(5) 他是个普通人, 并没有什么异乎常人的地方。(6) 如果你将4，6和11平均，你即得7。(7) 膳食平均每人5英镑。

translation: vt.避免；逃避；[律]使无效；撤销
examples: (1) You should avoid unnecessary repetition.(2) He'll grab at any excuse to avoid doing the dishes.(3) No one can avoid his own responsibility.
(1) 你应避免不必要的重复。(2) 他会随便找个借口来逃避洗碗。(3) 没有人能够逃避自己的责任。

(1) It is impossible to honor her with the award.(2) The child smiled at his teacher as he received the award.(3) It is the highest award a producer can receive.(4) Bill accepted the championship award on behalf of the team.(5) The university awarded him an honorary degree.(6) She has been awarded first prize four years in succession.(7) The judge awarded costs to the defendant.(8) Custody of the children was awarded to the mother.
(1) 奖品授给她是不可能的。(2) 孩子接过奖品时朝老师微笑着。(3) 这是一个制作人所能获得的最高奖项。(4) 比尔代表他的队接受了冠军奖。(5) 这所大学授给他名誉学位。(6) 她已连续四年获得一等奖。(7) 法官判由原告向被告支付诉讼费。(8) 儿童的监护权已判给母亲。
(1) If you were aware of all that, you would change your mind.(2) Then he became aware that they were regarding him with interest.
(1) 如果你知道了那一切,你会改变主意的。(2) 这时,他意识到他们都在饶有兴趣地看着他。

translation: adj.可怕的；表示敬畏的；了不起的；精彩的，绝妙的
examples: (1) An awesome thunderstorm struck the city yesterday.(2) The archaeologist stood in awesome silence before the ancient ruins.
(1) 昨天,一场可怕的暴风雨侵袭了这个城市。(2) 那名考古学家在古代遗址前充满敬畏地默立着。

translation: adj.糟糕的；可怕的；充满敬畏的；难受的adv.极其
examples: (1) It would be awful if he found out the truth.(2) I left Harvard with no real awareness of the awful inequities in the world.(3) I feel awful about not inviting her.(4) She said she had a sore throat and was feeling awful.(5) These weeks is an awful long time to wait.
(1) 如果他发现了真相，那就糟了。(2) 当我离开哈佛时,我并没真正有意识到这个世界存在着可怕的不平等现象。(3) 没有邀请她,我感到很内疚。(4) 她说她嗓子疼,而且感觉很难受。(5) 这几个星期真的是一段极其漫长的等待时间啊。

translation: adj.尴尬的；笨拙的；（设计）别扭的
examples: (1) It's a little awkward, because he's my friend but I'm still his boss.(2) He felt awkward and uncomfortable.(3) He seemed as awkward and rough as ever.(4) The handle of this teapot has an awkward shape.(5) The heavy ax was awkward to use.
(1) 他是我朋友,而我又是他老板,这真有点尴尬。(2) 他感到尴尬和不舒服。(3) 他跟从前一样拙笨和粗鲁。(4) 这茶壶把儿的形状真别扭。(5) 这把重斧头不好用。

(1) Though he was often mistaken for a garbage can.(2) The angry walker spewed his charges at a garbage can.(3) Chandler sulkily picks up a garbage can lid and uses it as an umbrella.(4) Please take the bag of trash to the garbage can.(5) He dumped all the refuse into the garbage can.
(1) 尽管他总被误认为是垃圾桶。(2) 那个忿怒的行人把怒气全撒在了那个垃圾桶上了。(3) 钱德勒很不高兴地抓起垃圾桶盖当雨伞。(4) 请将这袋垃圾拿到垃圾筒去。(5) 他将全部垃圾倒入垃圾桶。

(1) I come in answer to your ad for a salesman.(2) We were told to help ourselves to the food ad lib.(3) Problems were solved on an ad hoc basis.(4) Insert a want ad, and it may help.(5) His head sank down ad he fell asleep.(6) Points of policy are decided ad hoc.
(1) 我来应聘售货员的职位。(2) 这些食物让我们随便吃。(3) 做了一些变通问题便解决了。(4) 登一则招聘广告，也许有用。(5) 他睡着时头垂了下来。(6) 政策的条款是临时决定的。

translation: n.锚；锚状物；依靠；新闻节目主播；压阵队员v.抛锚；停泊；用锚系住；担任（广播电视新闻节目）的主持人
examples: (1) The ship dragged its anchor during the night.(2) Hope is his only anchor.(3) He was then doing the anchor.(4) The anchor man in a relay team runs last.(5) The ship was anchored off the shore.(6) We anchored our boat close to the shore.(7) He anchors a half-hour news show every day.
(1) 夜里,船把锚拖动了。(2) 希望是他唯一的依靠。(3) 他当时正主持新闻广播节目。(4) 接力队中的主力跑最后一棒。(5) 船在海岸处抛了锚。(6) 我们近岸泊船。(7) 他每天主持半小时的新闻广播。
On a boat, an anchor is a heavy object attached to a rope. You toss it overboard, it sinks to the bottom, and your vessel doesn't move. Anchor has the sense of what holds something in place.

When you anchor a bookshelf to the wall, you affix it to the wall so it won't come down. The anchor of a relay race is the last person to run. It's their job to hold the team's lead. And on televised news, the anchor is the person who is front and center delivering the current events, the one who draws viewers to the news on that particular station.

1[N-COUNT 可数名词]锚 An anchor is a heavy hooked object that is dropped from a boat into the water at the end of a chain in order to make the boat stay in one place. 2[V-ERG 及物/不及物动词]抛锚；使停泊 When a boat anchors or when you anchor it, its anchor is dropped into the water in order to make it stay in one place.   [V]  [V n]We could anchor off the pier...我们可以在码头附近下锚停泊。They anchored the boat.他们抛锚停船。3[VERB 动词]把…系住；使稳住；使固定 If you anchor an object somewhere, you fix it to something to prevent it moving from that place.   [V n prep]  [V-ed]The roots anchor the plant in the earth...根部使植物固定在土壤中。The child seat belt was not properly anchored to the car.儿童坐椅的安全带并未在车上固定到位。4[N-COUNT 可数名词]固定桩；系缚物；支柱；靠山 If one thing is the anchor for something else, it makes that thing stable and secure.   [oft N of/for n]He provided an emotional anchor for her...他是她的精神支柱。He remains the anchor of the country's fragile political balance.他仍然是维系该国脆弱的政治平衡的支柱。5[VERB 动词]与…有紧密联系；使扎根；使固守 If something is anchored in something or to something, it has strong links with it.   [be V-ed in/to n]  [V-ed]  [usu passive]A united Germany must be firmly anchored in NATO if Europe is to remain stable...欧洲要保持稳定，德国必须统一并固守北约。His basic outlook remains anchored in the liberal tradition.他的基本观念依旧扎根于自由主义传统。6[VERB 动词]主持（电视或电台节目，尤指新闻节目） The person who anchors a television or radio programme, especially a news programme, is the person who presents it and acts as a link between interviews and reports which come from other places or studios.   [V n]  [V-ed]  [mainly AM 主美]Viewers saw him anchoring a five-minute summary of regional news.观众看见他主持一个5分钟的地方新闻摘要节目。...a series of cassettes on the Vietnam War, anchored by Mr. Cronkite.克朗凯特先生主持的关于越南战争的系列节目录像带7[N-COUNT 可数名词]（尤指新闻节目的）电（视）台节目主持人 The anchor on a television or radio programme, especially a news programme, is the person who presents it.   [mainly AM 主美]He worked in the news division of ABC — he was the anchor of its 15-minute evening newscast.他在美国广播公司的新闻部工作——他是晚间15分钟新闻播报的主持人。8[PHRASE 短语]（船）抛着锚，停泊着 If a boat is at anchor, it is floating in a particular place and is prevented from moving by its anchor. Sailing boats lay at anchor in the narrow waterway.帆船停泊在狭窄的水道上。9[PHRASE 短语]抛锚；下锚 When the people on a boat drop anchor or cast anchor, they drop the boat's anchor into the water in order to prevent the boat from moving.   [V inflects]We dropped anchor in a sheltered spot.我们在一个能够遮风挡雨的地方下了锚。10[PHRASE 短语]起锚；启航 When the people on a boat weigh anchor or up anchor, they pull the anchor of the boat out of the water so that they can sail away.   [V inflects]
There is a pen on the table.We have a problem.I can only carry two at a time.Let's go to a Chinese restaurant.A cat is an animal.
桌子上有一支笔。我们有个问题。我一次只能带两个。我们去一家中餐餐馆。猫是动物。

translation: adj. 能；[经管] 有能力的；能干的n. (Able)人名；(伊朗)阿布勒；(英)埃布尔
examples: We shall be able to deal with all sorts of problem.She bet me 20 that I wouldn't be able to give up smoking.Free will makes us able to choose our way of life.By no means was he able to handle it.He is an able man.Difficulties help to forge people into able folk.
我们应该能够应付各种困难。她和我打20英镑的赌，说我戒不了烟。自由的意志使我们可以选择自己的生活方式。这件事他绝对没办法处理。他是一个能人。困难有助于把人们锻炼成能干的人。

translation: prep. 关于；大约adj. 在附近的；四处走动的；在起作用的adv. 大约；周围；到处n. 大致；粗枝大叶；不拘小节的人n. (About)人名；(法)阿布
examples: Tell me all about it.It is about six o'clock now.It was a long flight and it took about fourteen hours.All about us in the store were piles of goods.Dinner is about ready.He spoke to a few spectators standing about.He's eighty now, and doesn't get about much any more.He glanced quickly about and then stepped aside.He was about to start.A new book is about to be brought out.I was about to go out when he called on me.There is a rumor about that they're getting divorced.
告诉我关于这件事的一切。现在是六点钟左右。时间真长,飞了大约十四个小时。在这家店里,我们周围到处都是成堆的商品。中饭就要做好了。他和站在附近的围观者交谈。他现在80岁了,不能再到处走动了。他向四周扫了一眼,然后站在一旁。他即将动身。一本新书即将出版。当他来访时，我正要外出。正传闻说他们要离婚。

translation: prep. 超过；在……上面；在……之上adv. 在上面；在上文adj. 上文的n. 上文
examples: The glider was soaring above the valley.Applicants must be above the age of 18.The temperature has been above the average recently.The sun rose above the horizon.The bird is flying low above the water.A captain in the navy ranks above a captain in the army.The above bedroom is mine.From the above statement, I think he is right.We are fascinated by the stars twinkling above.Seen from above, the fields looked like a geometrical pattern.The temperature is six above.He wrote a book with 200 pages and above.She married above her.Above all, it is the present that we should cherish.All the details have been listed above.

那架滑翔机在山谷上空滑翔。申请者的年龄必须超过18岁。近来的气温一直比平均温度高。太阳升到地平线上。那只鸟在水面上低飞。海军的上校军衔高于陆军的上尉军衔。上面的房间是我的。从以上的陈述来看,我认为他是对的。天空中闪烁的星星让我们陶醉着。从上面往下看,那些农田像是几何图案。温度在零上六度。他写了一本篇幅为200页以上的书。她嫁给了社会地位比她高的人。最重要的是,我们要珍惜现在。在上文中,所有的细节已经罗列出来了。

translation: adv. 在国外；到海外adj. 往国外的n. 海外；异国
examples: He is travelling abroad.He lived abroad for many years.The news spread abroad.There's a rumour abroad that she intends to leave the company.Our products have entered the markets abroad.He's currently abroad on business.
他要到国外旅行。他在国外居住了许多年。那消息四处传播。谣言盛传她打算离开公司。我们的产品已打入国外市场。目前他正在国外做生意。

translation: n. 事故；意外；[法] 意外事件；机遇
examples: His left knee was hurt in a traffic accident.Happily, the accident was prevented.The other day I came across an interesting accident.I started the hobby almost by accident.By accident of birth he is entitled to British citizenship.
他的左膝在一次交通事故中受伤了。很幸运，事故得以避免了。几天前,我碰到一件意外事情。我有了这个爱好纯属偶然。因出生的造化
Hearsay definitely can't be regarded as accurate information.The manager impressed on his office staff the importance of keeping accurate records.
道听途说的决然不能算作很准确的消息。经理让办公室职员认识到做精确记录的重要性。

translation: prep. 穿过；横穿adv. 横过；在对面
examples: Can you swim across the river?The drunk man staggered across the room.Edgar looked in anger across at Miriam.When my name was called, he looked across at me.The post office is just across from the club.I've finished the crossword apart from 3 across and 10 down.A big tree fell across the ditch.A bridge across the river must be built.I helped a blind man across the street.My house is just across the street.We shall soon be across the Channel.He shouted to me from across the room.She gave him a slap across the face.Her family is scattered across the country.The peasants across the country are on strike.
你能游到河的对岸吗？那个醉汉摇摇晃晃地穿过房间。埃德加气鼓鼓地看着对面的米丽安。当叫到我名字的时候，他从那边朝我看过来。邮局就在那俱乐部对面。这份纵横字谜除横3竖10以外我都填完了。一棵大树横贯沟渠倒下。必须造一座跨越这条河的桥。我扶一个盲人过了街。我家就在对街上。我们不久即将渡过英吉利海峡了。他从房间的另一边向我喊。她打了他一个耳光。她家中的人散居全国各地。这个国家的农民在进行罢工。

translation: adj. 积极的；活跃的；主动的；有效的；现役的n. 主动语态；积极分子
examples: Ms. Brown is active in the party.He is an active member of the school's stamp club.She was active as a left-winger in the party.We should take active part in extracurricular activities.Vesuvius is an active volcano.She has an active imagination.
布朗女士在晚会上很活跃。他是学校集邮俱乐部的一名活跃会员。她是党内积极的左翼分子。我们应该积极参加课外活动。维苏威山是一座活火山。她有灵活的想象力。

We love outdoor activity.We plan to expand our business activities in East Africa.The volcano is in activity.There was a sudden spurt of activity in the housing market.Busking is a fun activity for the performer.Interactive music-making frequently blurs the conventional distinction between compositional and improvisational activity.
我们热爱户外活动。我们打算在东非扩展我们的商业活动。这火山正活跃著。房产市场突然活跃了一阵子。街头表演对于街头艺人来说是一项有乐趣的活动。交互音乐的创作过程经常会模糊传统意义上的作曲与即兴表演这两种行为之间的界限。

That's an interesting ad.I got four replies to my ad about the bicycle for sale.The ad was run in the paper for a week.This tradition has been traced back to the sixth century AD.It was first built in 326 AD and restored several times through the centuries.
那是有趣的广告。已经收到了四份对我出售自行车广告的回信。这则广告在报上连续刊登了一个星期。这一传统已被追溯到公元16世纪。它始建于公元326年。几个世纪以来，人们对它进行了几次重建。

translation: vt. 演说；从事；忙于；写姓名地址；向…致辞；与…说话；提出；处理n. 地址；演讲；致辞；说话的技巧；称呼
examples: Please write your home address on the registration form.I'll log in to the internet to know about you. I know your address.Can you tell me your E-mail address?What form of address should one use when writing to a bishop?Mr. Youshida will give an address during today's morning assembly. May I start my work on the telefax machine after that?The mayor gave a television address yesterday evening.The president gave an address over the radio.Luke's homely, unpretending style, and his pleasing address catch the ear of the people.Most people call me Bob. How do I address you?He is going to address the meeting.He addressed the audience in an eloquent speech.Please address all enquiries to this office.Could you help me address these envelopes?There is a letter addressed to you.The next meeting will address the problem of truancy.

请在这张登记表上写下你的家庭住址。我还是上因特网去看吧，我知道你们的网址。能告诉我你的电子邮箱地址吗?给主教写信应该怎样称呼?今天早会吉田先生要致词，会后我可以开始我的电传工作吗?市长昨晚作了电视演讲。总统发表广播演讲。卢克朴实而不矜持的作风以及讨人喜欢的谈吐使得人们都很愉快。大家叫我鲍勃,我怎么称呼你?他将向大会作演说。他向听众发表了雄辩的演说。一切查询请向本办公室提出。帮我给这些信封写地址好吗？有封写给你收的信。下次会议将着手解决学生的逃课问题。

translation: vt. 给予，提供；买得起n. (Afford)人名；(英)阿福德
examples: Only the well-to-do can afford these houses.I can't afford a holiday this summer.We can afford to overlook minor offences.We can't afford to pay such a price.They could ill afford to lose any more staff.We cannot afford to ignore this warning.These trees afford a pleasant shade.
只有富人能买得起这些房子。今年夏天我无法度假。我们可以不计较小过。我们付不起这个价钱。他们再也不能损失员工了。我们对这个警告绝不能等闲视之。这些树提供了荫凉。

translation: adj. 害怕的；恐怕；担心的
examples: I'm afraid we can't come.I'm afraid I didn't quie catch what you said.I didn't mention it because I was afraid of upsetting him/afraid (that) I might upset him.Are you afraid of snakes?Children feel afraid when they are at home alone.
很抱歉，我们不能来。对不起,我没听清你刚才所说的话。我没有提起那件事，因为我怕他心烦意乱。你怕蛇吗?孩子独自自己在家,感到害怕。

Africa is full of adventurers.Peoples in Africa are living in penury.Africa is exporting beef to Europe.Africa is a mysterious land to him.He took many photos of the wide tracts of desert in North Africa.He told a very lively story about his life in Africa.
在非洲有很多冒险家。非洲的人民过着贫穷的生活。非洲向欧洲出口牛肉。对他来说，非洲是一片神秘的土地。他拍了许多关于北非的广大沙漠的照片。他非常生动地讲述了他在非洲的生活。

translation: adv. 后来，以后prep. 在……之后conj. 在……之后adj. 以后的
examples: They met in June and became lovers soon after.The day after, he apologized.They lived happily ever after.After dinner we paired off and went to dance.After travelling for three days I slept for twenty hours at a stretch.C comes after B in the alphabet.They inquired after you.We ran after the thief.We've named the baby after you.
他们在六月相遇, 不久就成了情侣。次日，他道歉了。他们後来一直生活得很幸福。饭后我们成双成对地跳舞去了。连续3天旅行之后，我一连睡了20个小时。在字母表中C接在B后面。他们问候你。我们追赶窃贼。我们是依照你的名字给这婴儿取名的。
Good afternoon!She could knit up a baby's coatee in an afternoon.I met him in a hot and breathless afternoon.
下午好！她一个下午就能编结好一件婴孩的紧身短上衣。我是在一个又闷又热的下午遇到他的。

She died in an accident shortly afterwards.Soon afterwards he made his first public statement about the affair.They lived happily ever afterwards.Three days afterward they met at the airport.When it came to cleaning up afterwards, the boys were conspicuous by their absence.His illness was a blessing in disguise, because he afterwards married his nurse.We saw the play separately and compared notes afterwards.
不久以后，她就在一次事故中丧生。不久以后，他第一次就这一事件发表了公开声明。以后他们一直幸福地生活着。三天以后他们在机场碰头。后来轮到做卫生时,这些男孩却不在场,引起了大家的注意。他生病倒是因祸得福，因为后来他和他的护士结了婚。我们各自看了那出戏,后来交换了意见。

translation: adv. 又，此外；再一次；再说；增加n. （英、保）阿盖恩
examples: Try again.Say that again, please.I am longing to see my friend Jack again.I am sorry-she's out. Can you ring again later?You'll never get the money back again.He has spoken down again after slightly pausing.After ten years in prison, he was a free man again.He sucked in air, then went under the water again.
再试试。请再说一遍。我渴望再见到我的朋友杰克。对不起－她出去了。你过些时候再打电话来好吗？那笔钱你再也弄不回来了。他在略作停顿后又讲了下去。他坐了十年监狱，又成了自由人。他深深吸了一口气又潜到水里。

translation: prep. 反对，违反；靠；倚；防备adj. 不利的；对立的
examples: There are 26 votes for him and 8 against him.We sailed against the wind.It's against your promise to go on smoking.They forced me to do things against my will.He propped himself against the wall.The huge trees were profiled against the night sky.We have saved some money against our old age.Our defences must be reinforced against attack.His eloquence did not avail against the facts.You must weigh the benefits against the cost.
有26票赞成他，8票反对他。我们逆风航行。继续抽烟,这违背了你的诺言。他们强迫我做违背我心意的事。他倚靠着墙。在夜空的映衬下显出大树的轮廓。我们存了一些钱，以备老年之用。我们必须加强防御设施以抵御进攻。他的雄辩在事实面前不起什么作用。你一定要权衡利益与成本二者的得失。

translation: n. 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段vi. 成熟；变老vt. 使成熟；使变老，使上年纪n. (Age)人名；(瑞典)阿格；(日)扬 (姓)；(西、荷)阿赫
examples: What is your age?The child is at an impressionable age.We are living in the age of technology.Rome was in its prime in the age of Augustus.Each civilization has its golden age.I haven't seen you for ages.Anxiety ages us.The death of his wife caused him to age fast.The wine is put into oak casks to age.The cheese is left to age for at least a year.
你多大年纪？这孩子正处于易受影响的年龄。我们生活在工业技术时代。罗马帝国的全盛期是在奥古斯都时代。每个文明都有它的鼎盛时期。我好久没见到你了。忧虑催人老。他妻子的死使他变老了许多。酒被放进橡木桶中变陈。这种奶酪至少要搁一年才成熟。

translation: adv. 以前，以往adj. 以前的；过去的n. (Ago)人名；(英、西、意、塞、瑞典)阿戈
examples: The dinosaurs disappeared long ago.A hundred years ago, Britain had a large empire.
恐龙很久以前就绝种了。一百年以前，英国有一个很大的帝国。

translation: vt. 同意，赞成；承认；约定，商定vi. vi. 同意，意见一致；约定，商定
examples: We agreed to leave at once.I, for my part, totally agree with you.I didn't agree from the very beginning.We must agree to differ on this.Spicy food does not agree with me.The witnesses' statements just don't agree with each other.
我们同意立即离开。至於我,我完全同意你的看法。我从一开始就不赞成。我们得承认在这一问题上有分歧。辛辣食物不合我的胃口。几个证人的陈述并不一致。

translation: n. 空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调vt. 使通风，晾干；夸耀vi. 通风
examples: The fresh air in the morning made him feel glad.There is a bird flying through the air.The archers sent their shafts through the air.There was an air of excitement at the meeting.There is an air of abstraction in her face.He played a delightful air on his flute.You will lose friends if you put on airs.You should air the clothes to get the damp out.The doctor recommended him to air the room.We need to air out the smoke-filled rooms.
早晨的新鲜空气使他觉得愉快。一只小鸟从天空飞过。弓箭手向空中射出利箭。开会时气氛显得有些兴奋。她脸上带着一种心不在焉的神态。他用笛子吹奏了一支欢快的曲调。你如果装腔作势,就会失去朋友。你应该把衣服晾一下去去潮气。医生建议他打扫房间。我们得把满是烟味的房间通通风。
The plane circled the airport before landing.There was a great outcry about the construction of the new airport.You must arrive at the airport two hours early.
飞机在着陆之前在机场上空盘旋。公众强烈反对修建该机场。你必须提前两小时到达机场。

translation: adj. 相似的；相同的adv. 以同样的方式；类似于
examples: We are much alike in character.The two brothers are very much alike.The sisters are as alike as two peas.These kittens look exactly alike how can you tell which is which?No two people think alike.The government taxed the rich and the poor alike.She treats all her students alike.
我们的性格很相似。这两兄弟非常相像。两姐妹长得一模一样。这些小猫看上去一模一样--你怎么能分出哪个是哪个?没有两个人的想法是一样的。政府对富人和穷人同样征税。她对她所有的学生都同样看待。

translation: adj. 活着的；活泼的；有生气的
examples: She clung to the hope that her son was still alive.Are your grandparents still alive?Although he is eighty, he is still very much alive.He is fully alive to the possible dangers.The city was all alive when he arrived.
她始终抱着儿子还活着的希望。你的祖父母还在世吗？他虽有八十岁了，但仍然充满了活力。他充分注意到会有危险。当他到达时，城里非常热闹。

translation: adj. 全部的adv. 全然地；越发n. 全部pron. 全部n. (All)人名；(瑞典)阿尔；(英)奥尔
examples: All wood tends to shrink.All my plants have died.He spent all his time reading.His temperature seems to be all right.Her children are all very brainy.She was all excited.We are grateful to you for all you have done.All enjoyed themselves.All of the toys are broken.
所有木头都会缩一些.我的花草全死光了。他把全部时间都花在阅读上。他的体温好像完全正常。她的孩子个个都很聪明。她非常兴奋.我们对你所做的一切表示感谢。每个人都玩得很尽兴。所有的玩具都坏了。

translation: vt. 允许；给予；认可vi. 容许；考虑
examples: You are not allowed to smoke here.How much holiday are you allowed?I should allow an hour to get to London.The judge assented to allow the prisoner to speak.If you'll allow me,I will send you back.It will take you half an hour to get to the station, allowing for traffic delays.The patient was allowed up (ie permitted to get out of bed) after 10 days.
这里不许吸烟。你有多少天假?到伦敦去我得留出一小时来。法官同意允许犯人申辩。如果你能同意，我可以送你回家。把路上的耽搁算进去，你要用半小时才能到车站。病人十天以后才允许起来(准予离床下地).

He slipped and almost fell.She was almost mad with grief when her son died.This event was almost simultaneous with that one.It's almost time to go.The bridge is almost 2 kilometres long.The girl was annoyed by his almost impudence.
他脚下一滑，险些跌倒。她的儿子死去时，她悲伤得几乎疯了。这件事几乎是与那件事同时发生的。差不多是该走的时候了。这座桥差不多有两公里长。他几近厚颜无耻的态度把那个女孩给惹恼了。

translation: adj. 独自的；单独的；孤独的adv. 独自地；单独地
examples: Tom is not alone in finding Rick hard to work with.I was alone in the classroom.To tell you the truth, I don't feel like being alone tonight.After tea I wandered alone about the town.You can't live on bread alone.
并不只是汤姆一人认为和里克难以共事。我独自在教室里。说实话,我今晚不想孤单一人。吃过下午茶,我独自在城里漫步。你不能仅靠面包维生。

translation: adv. 一起；向前；来到prep. 沿着；顺着
examples: We walked along the road.The procession passed along the street.You can go straight along this street to the traffic light.He walked along the mountain ridge.A small boat was drifting along.He sang loudly as he walked along.You can take the letters along with the newspapers.John brought his friends along.
我们沿着路走。游行队伍沿着街道前进。你可以顺着这条街一直走到红绿灯处。他顺着山脊走。一条小船正向前漂流着。他边向前走边大声唱著歌。秘书把信和报纸一起拿走。约翰带他的朋友一起去。
I've already paid my membership dues.The new rules have already come into play.You had already gone when I arrived there.I've been there already and don't want to go again.
我已经交了我的会员费。新规则已经开始生效。当我到达时，你已经走了。我曾到过那，不想再去了。

translation: adv. 也；而且；同样conj. 并且；另外n. (Also)人名；(罗)阿尔索
examples: We should also take account of difficulties.London was also called the modern Babylon.This book is not only interesting but also good.Tom has been to Japan, I have also been there.
我们也应该考虑到困难。伦敦也被称为现代巴比伦。这本书不仅有趣,而且内容也非常好。汤姆曾去过日本，我也曾去过。

translation: conj. 尽管；虽然；但是；然而
examples: Although my uncle is old, he looks very strong and healthy.Although they can swim, the polar bears are terrestrial animals.Although she was poor, she was living in genteel poverty.No, this is not what we mean by framing, although the principle is the same.I did not know that then, although I learned it later.
我的叔叔虽然老了，但他看上去还是很健壮。北极熊虽然会游泳，但也是陆栖动物。尽管她贫穷，但她总想装出上流社会阶层的样子。不,这不是我们所讲的框架的含义,尽管法则是一样的。当时我不知道那件事，然而我后来知道了。

translation: adv. 永远，一直；总是；常常
examples: I'm always at home in the evenings.A live band is always a good draw at a party.We should always help each other.They will always be friends.You can always resign if you feel unhappy.You could always use a dictionary.
晚上我总是在家里。现场演奏的乐队在聚会上总是很吸引人的。我们应始终互相帮助。他们将永远是朋友。如果你不满意,随时可以辞职。你无论如何还可以使用词典嘛。

translation: abbr. 调频，调谐，调幅（ amplitude modulation）vi. （用于第一人称单数现在时）aux. （与v-ing连用构成现在进行时，与v-ed连用构成被动语态）n. （柬）安（人名）
examples: I am a doctor.I am filled with the desire to go back home.I think I am quite a patient person.
我是个医生。我心中充满了回家的渴望。我认为我是一个相当有耐心的人。

translation: adj. 令人惊异的v. 使吃惊（amaze的ing形式）
examples: Just look at it. Isn't it amazing!We listened to her amazing story with rapt attention.It was amazing that he knew nothing about the event.He had a series of amazing adventures after he was flushed down the toilet.In the Olympic Games, Liu Xiang ran with amazing speed and won the first place.
你看看。真叫人惊叹！我们全神贯注地倾听她讲的惊人故事。他对这个事件毫不知情，真让人感到诧异。被冲进马桶后,他经历了一连串的奇妙冒险。在奥运会上,刘翔跑得飞快,以惊人的速度赢得了第一。

translation: n. 美洲（包括北美和南美洲）；美国
examples: Are you going to America by boat or by plane?It's time for us to say "No" to America.One of his forefathers was an early settler in America.There were lots of buffaloes in the North America 100 years ago.Maize is widely planted in the America.
你到美国是坐船还是坐飞机？是我们对美国说不的时候了。他的祖先之一是美洲的早期移民。100年前，北美有大量的野牛。玉米在美洲广泛种植。
I live among the mountains.He climbed up the tree and hid among the branches.New York is among the largest cities in the world.This book counts among the best of his works.
我住在群山之中。他爬上树去,藏在树枝里。纽约是世界上最大的几座城市之一。这本书被认为是他的最佳作品之一。

He analysed the food and found that it contained poison.Let's analyse the problem and see what went wrong.The coach tried to analyse the cause of our defeat.We must try to analyse the causes of the strike.
他对这种食物做了化验，发现有毒。让我们分析一下这道题，看什么地方出错了。教练努力设法分析我们失败的原因。我们得研究一下罢工的原因。

translation: conj. 和，与；就；而且；但是；然后n. (And)人名；(土、瑞典)安德
examples: My father and mother went for a walk.She majored in maths and physics (at university).She demonstrated that 2 and 2 are four.I drove up in front of the house and honked.Work hard and you will be successful.
爸爸妈妈去散步了。她(在大学)主修数学和物理。她证明2加2等于四。我将车开到屋子前面然后按喇叭。努力工作，你就会成功。

translation: adj. 生气的；愤怒的；狂暴的；（伤口等）发炎的
examples: His imperious look makes us angry.Don't be angry over such trivial matters.He shouts when he gets angry, as is often the case.There was an angry squall from the bedroom.The players were jostled by an angry crowd as they left the field.
他那飞扬跋扈的样子令我们生气。别为这些琐事生气。他生气时就大叫，这是常有的情形。卧室里传出一声愤怒的喊叫。运动员们离开赛场时，被愤怒的人群推搡着。

The jackal is a wild animal in Africa and Asia.This small animal has a pair of brown eyes.A pig is a domestic animal.The animal is dangerous when cornered.Try to cut down on the amount of animal fats you eat.Animal husbandry is important in this area.People are people because the human mind can contain the animal instinct.
豺狼是产于亚非的一种野生动物。这只小动物有一双棕色的眼睛。猪是一种家畜。野兽一旦陷于绝境就会变得很危险。尽量减少你食用的动物脂肪的量。畜牧业在这一带很重要。人之所以为人,是因为能用头脑里的人性遏制本能的兽性。

translation: adj. 又一，另一；另外的；不同的pron. 另一个；又一个prep. 另一个；另一个人
examples: It is just as well that you took another road.She has been transferred to another department.Will you like another cup of tea?The agreement has been renewed for another year.I don't like this one. Please show me anotherShakespeare is the greatest English writer. Will there ever be such another?He hates being sticked in the sour job but can not find another.
还好你们走了另一条路。她已被调往另一个部门。你要再来一杯茶吗？该协定的期限已经再延长一年。我不喜欢这个，请给我另一个。莎士比亚是最伟大的英国文豪--还能有这样的人物吗?他讨厌老是做这份枯燥乏味的工作,可是又找不到别的差事。

translation: vt. 回答；符合vi. 回答；符合n. 回答；答案；答辩
examples: The question is simple enough to answer.she fell into a rage and refused to answer.He answered that he knew nothing about it.He has a large amount of mail to answer every day.I have to type letters and answer the phone.Do you know the answer to this question?If you think carefully, you will find the answer.He knocked at the door but there was no answer.You'd better talk it over with your wife and give me your answer tomorrow.
这个问题很简单,容易回答。他勃然大怒,拒不回答。他答复说关于此事他一无所知。他每天有大量的信件要回复。我又得用打字机打信你知道这道题的答案吗？仔细考虑一下,你就会找到答案。他敲了门,但是没有人回答。你最好和你的妻子商量一下,明天给我一个答复吧。

translation: adj. 任何的；所有的；丝毫pron. 任何；任何一个；若干adv. 稍微；少许n. (Any)人名；(法、罗)阿尼
examples: I can't stay any longer.I can't see things getting any better
我一刻也不能再呆下去了。我看不出事情有丝毫好转

translation: pron. 任何人n. 重要人物
examples: He didn't want to team up with anybody.By anybody's standards that work of art is A-1.
他不想与任何人合作。那件艺术品按任何人的标准都是第一流的。
We dislike to have anyone patronize us.She never heeded anyone's warning.
我们不喜欢任何人对我们以恩人自居。她从不理会任何人的警告。

If you remember anything at all, please let us know.The hotel was anything but satisfactory.Is there anything for me?Anything will do to keep the door open.You had to be something to start with, and Jeremy never was anything.He isn't anything like my first boss.
你要是想起什么来，就告诉我们。这家旅馆太不让人满意了。有东西给我吗？只要能使门敞开着，什么东西都行。你必须得开始象个样子，杰里米从来就一事无成。他一点也不像我第一个老板。

translation: adv. 在任何地方；无论何处n. 任何地方
examples: The city welcomes visitors from anywhere.One day they may be able to go anywhere in space.
这座城市欢迎来自任何地方的来访客人。会有那么一天，它们也许能够进入太空的任何地方。

translation: vi. 出现；显得；似乎；出庭；登场
examples: A ship appeared on the horizon.His book appears on the market.An article about him appeared in the paper.She appeared very confident.You appear unhappy.
船出现在水平线上。他的书出版了。一篇有关他的文章在报上发表。她显得很自信。你看起来好像不高兴。

translation: n. 苹果，苹果树，苹果似的东西；[美俚]炸弹，手榴弹，（棒球的）球；[美俚]人，家伙。
examples: My uncle has an apple orchard.The apple trees are blossoming.He regard his new bike as the apple of his eye.He's a rotten apple.
我叔叔拥有一个苹果园。苹果树正在开花。他把他的新自行车视为珍宝。他是一个讨厌的家伙。
The proposal was accepted with unanimous approval.We should submit our plans to the council for approval.Your approval gives me much gratification.He showed his approval by shaking my hands.
全体一致通过了那项建议。我们应该向理事会提交计划以求批准。承蒙认可，我非常高兴。他和我握手，表示赞成。
April is the time to plant trees.The manuscript bears the date 10 April 1937.He moved into this house in April.
四月是种树的时候。手稿上注著1937年4月10日。他是四月份搬进这所房子的。

translation: n. 手臂；武器；袖子；装备；部门vi. 武装起来vt. 武装；备战
examples: You should wind a cloth round the wounded arm.The archer holds the bow in his bow arm.His left arm was hurt in an accident.He draped his legs over the arm of the chair.There's a tear in the arm of my jacket.They were not allowed to use arms.We must arm ourselves against the enemy.The new battleship shall be armed with 16-inch guns.The nation must arm its soldiers for battle.
你应该把一块布缠在受伤的和臂上。运动员用执弓臂握住弓。他的左胳膊在一次事故中受伤了。他懒洋洋地把双腿搭在椅子的扶手上。我上衣袖子上有个破囗。不许他们使用武器。我们必须武装自己,防范敌人。新战舰将以16英寸口径的大炮武装起来。国家必须装备士兵，以防打仗。

translation: adv. 大约；到处；在附近prep. 四处；在…周围
examples: He runs around the playground.I saw him around the place this morning.The earth moves around the sun.There're around 1000 employees in this company.I can't arrange everything around your timetable.We have travelled around in Europe for six weeks.You have 15 minutes to look around.There was more money around in those days.There were several young people sitting around looking bored.He turned around as he heard a noise behind him.He is the most intelligent artist around today.There are many new cars around.
他在运动场上到处跑。今天早上我看见他就在那儿附近。地球围绕太阳运动。这个公司大约有1000名员工。我不可能事事都按照你的时刻表安排。我们在欧洲各地旅行了六个星期。你有15分钟的时间到周围看看。那年头比现在富裕。有几个年青人闲坐着，一副无聊的样子。他听到身后有响声，便转过身来。他是如今在世的最有才华的艺术家。有大量新车上市。

translation: vi. 到达；成功；达成；出生n. (Arrive)人名；(法)阿里夫
examples: We shall arrive soon after.You must arrive at the airport two hours early.The great day has arrived.The baby finally arrived just after midnight.You know you've arrived when you're asked to appear on TV.
我们将很快就到达。你必须提前两小时到达机场。伟大的日子已经到来。婴儿终於在刚过午夜时候降生了.邀请你在电视上亮相的时候，你就知道你已经名声在外了。

translation: n. （包括雕塑、绘画、音乐等的） 艺术，美术；美术（作）品；艺品（作）品；（表演）艺术；技术，技巧；adj. 艺术的；艺术品的；具有艺术性的v. be的现在式单数第二人称形式，过时用法
examples: She displayed great ardor for art.She joined the university art society.She has an appreciation of art and music.The art of painting is not easy to learn.She is capable of judging works of art.Are you a Bachelor of Arts?She teaches art history in university.She studied sculpture at art school.
她对艺术表现出极大的热心。她加入了大学里的艺术协会。她对于美术和音乐有了解。画画的技巧是不容易学的。她有鉴赏艺术品的能力。你是文学学士吗？她在大学里教艺术史。她在美术学校学习雕刻。

translation: n. 艺术家；美术家（尤指画家）；大师
examples: She is a consummate artist.He is a notable artist.His dream of becoming an artist has been fulfilled.The vital spark in him makes him an artist.The artist painted her strolling her garden.Finally she realized her intention of becoming an artist.The artist must have spent hours etching the image on the glass.She also got the title of the best new artist.Madonna is highly rated as a performing artist but not as a person.
她是个技艺高超的艺术家。他是一位著名的艺术家。他成为一个艺术家的梦想实现了。他生气勃勃的活力使他成为一个艺术家。美术家画了一张她在花园里漫步的画。最后她实现了当美术家的愿望。这位美术家一定花了好几小时把这画像蚀刻在玻璃上。她还获得了最佳新艺人的头衔。作为一位艺人,人们对麦当娜的评价很高,但对其为人则不然。

translation: conj. 因为；随着；虽然；依照；当…时prep. 如同；当作；以…的身份adv. 同样地；和…一样的
examples: The ground was as white as snow with petals that had drifted down from the apple trees.Many things pollute water, such as tires, trash, and plastic bags.This cathedral was regarded as a miracle in architectural history.As a cub reporter he would learn the facts of life in the newspaper world.Just as writing a fiction,programming is a process of creating art.As the wage of the job was low, there were few applicants for it.Despite the threat of war, people go about their work as usual.A sudden chill of horror sweep over her as she feel the drip of saliva upon her hand.Gambling is not the same as investment in the stock market. It's a horse of a different colour.He did not follow our advice so as to be arrested by the police.As difficult as it seems to be,the problem is by no means a new one.

满地是苹果树上飘落下来的花瓣，地上一片雪白。很多东西使水污染，例如轮胎、垃圾和塑胶袋。这座大教堂被认为是建筑史上的奇迹。作为一名初出茅庐的记者，他要了解报界生涯的内幕。如同写小说一样，程序设计也是一个艺术创造的过程。因为工资低,没有什么人申请这份工作。尽管战争一触即发，人们仍像平时一样工作。当她感觉到滴到她双手上的唾液时，恐怖的寒栗突然遍布了她全身。赌博与把资金投入股市并不一样,它完全是另外一码事。　他不听我们的劝告,结果被逮捕。尽管看起来很难,这个问题却并非新问题。

translation: vt. 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价vi. 问，询问；要求n. (Ask)人名；(芬、瑞典)阿斯克
examples: May I ask a question?I'm calling to ask you about the delivery.He'll lend you the money if you ask him.It was such a big job that he had to ask for help .I have asked some friends for tea.I have the right to ask for an explanation.My father ask me to account for my conduct.The man asked ten dollars for the book.As parents, we should not ask too much of our children.
我可以问一个问题吗？我打电话给你,是询问发货的事。如果你请求他的话，他就会把钱借给你。这项工作量太大，他得请求帮助。我请了一些朋友来喝茶。我有权要求一个解释。我父亲要求我为自己的行为负责。那个人竟然给这本书开价十美元。作为父母,我们不应该过分要求孩子。

translation: adj. 睡着的；麻木的；长眠的adv. 熟睡地；进入睡眠状态
examples: The lion lay asleep in its den.He soon fell asleep with weariness.Some people grind their teeth while they are asleep.My grandfather was asleep forever.Her mind was asleep.When I woke my left arm was asleep.The fat guy dropped asleep shortly after the film began.Their anxieties were put asleep.
狮子躺在洞里睡觉。他疲倦地很快就睡着了。有些人睡觉时磨牙齿。我的祖父过世了。她的头脑停顿了。我醒来时我的左臂麻木了。电影开始不久,那个胖子就睡着了。他们的焦虑平息了。

translation: n. 助手，助理，助教adj. 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
examples: The Prime Minister came to visit our country in the company of his assistant.Wang wore two hats as chief of marketing research and assistant head of sales.She is an assistant teacher in our school.
首相在其助手陪同下访问我国。王先生身兼两职,是市场调查部主任,也是营销部副主任。她是我们学校的助理教员。

translation: prep. 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；以（某种价格、速度等）；向；达；因为；朝；忙于n. 阿特（老挝货币基本单位att）；[化]砹（极不稳定放射性元素）abbr. 密封的（airtight）；气温（air temperature）
examples: I'm sorry to obtrude on you at such a time.She had her hair styled at the beauty parlor.Snipers shot at the invaders from the roof tops.She makes eyes at the handsome young man.The airplane flies at 900 kilometers an hour.
我很抱歉在这个时候打扰你。她的头发是在美容院做的。狙击手从房顶上向侵略者射击。她向那位英俊的小伙子送秋波。飞机以每小时900公里的速度飞行。

translation: n. 攻击；抨击；疾病发作vt. 攻击；抨击；动手干vi. 攻击；腐蚀n. (Attack)人名；(瑞典)阿塔克
examples: The police are launching a major attack on drug dealers.His attack on the government was pure vitriol.The enemy attacked us at night.There is a newspaper article attacking the Prime Minister.Once you show any sign of fear, he will attack you.It is reported that this disease attacks the central nervous system.
警方对毒品贩子发动了大规模的攻击。他纯粹出于恶意抨击政府。敌人在夜里向我们进攻。报纸上有一篇抨击首相的文章.你一旦露出任何恐惧的迹象,他就会攻击你。据报道说这种疾病破坏中枢神经系统。

translation: vt. 吸引；引起vi. 吸引；有吸引力
examples: The flower show attracted large crowds this year.She gave a quiet cough to attract my attention.His comments were bound to attract criticism.
今年的花展吸引了大批观众。她轻轻地咳了一声好引起我注意。他的评论必然会招致批评。

translation: n. 观众；听众；读者；接见；正式会见；拜会
examples: The audience was no less than five thousand.Someone in the audience began to laugh.The concert drew a large audience.The article was put out in a national magazine to reach a larger audience.The audience lapped up his monologue.His enrapt audience seemed to hang on every word he said.Each style or form has its own audience.
听众有五千人之多。观众中有人开始笑起来。音乐会吸引了大量的观众。为了能影响更多的读者,文章被登发在一份国家级杂志上。听众倾听他的独白。那如醉如痴的听众似乎对他所说的每一个字都凝神倾听。每一种格调或形式各有其拥护者。

translation: adj. 威严的；令人敬畏的n. 八月（简写为Aug）n. (August)人名；(法、葡、西、俄、罗、英、德、瑞典、挪)奥古斯特
examples: There's an august group of statesmen in the auditorium.The august presence of the queen impressed me.Tourism is at its peak in August.His summer vacation will end in the late August.
大礼堂里坐着一群德高望重的政治家。皇后尊贵的出场给我留下了深刻印象。旅游业在八月份达到高峰。他的暑假将于八月底结束。

translation: n. 阿姨；姑妈；伯母；舅妈
examples: She has no relations besides an aged aunt.My aunt gave me one of her brooches as a keepsake.I'm duty bound to visit my old aunt.He was being terribly friendly to Aunt Liu.I'm trying to track down my old Aunt Maud.My elder sister had a baby last month, so I am an aunt now.My aunt generally come to see me on Sunday.
她除了有一个年老的伯母以外，再没有亲戚了。我姑母把她的一支胸针送给我作记念。我有义务去探望年老的姑妈。这天他对刘大婶婶态度特别友好。我正试图寻找到我那年迈的婶婶莫德。我姐姐上个月生了孩子，所以我现在是阿姨了。我姨一般是在星期天来看我。
My foreign teacher came from Australia.Australia is the hometown of kangaroos.Sydney is the largest city in Australia.
我的外籍教师来自澳大利亚。澳大利亚是袋鼠的故乡。悉尼是澳大利亚最大的城市。

translation: adj. 澳大利亚的，澳大利亚人的n. 澳大利亚人
examples: American and Australian zip codes are numeric.The Australian seasons are the opposite.Aha, I would appreciate another style of Australian writhing.This type of event typifies the Australian personality.
美国和澳大利亚的邮递区号是数字的。澳大利亚的季节是截然相反的。哈哈，我又可以领略澳大利亚人的另一种写作风格了。此类活动彰显了澳大利亚人的个性。

translation: n. 秋天；成熟期；渐衰期，凋落期adj. 秋天的，秋季的n. (Autumn)人名；(英)奥特姆
examples: The autumn or winter term start in September.Autumn crops promised to be equally good.The chill of autumn is in the air.I think autumn is the most beautiful season in a year.
秋季或冬季学期九月份开始。秋季作物看来收成也会同样很好。秋天的寒意到处感觉得到。我认为秋天是一年中最美的季节。

translation: vi. 觉醒，意识到；醒来；被唤起vt. 唤醒；使觉醒；激起，唤起adj. 醒着的
examples: The children are still wide awake.The smart of his wound kept him awake.A pilot must be awake to the changes in the weather.He is awake to the serious problem.You should be more awake to the danger of your position.Nothing can awake her interest in this trip.Don't worry! I shall awake him on time.He likes to awake to the sound of a radio.I was glad to awake from such a nightmare.
孩子们仍然完全醒着。伤痛使他无法入睡。飞行员必须警觉天气的变化。他已意识到这个严重的问题。你应该更加意识到你处境的危险。没有东西可唤起她对这次旅行的兴趣。不用担心!到时我会叫醒他的。他喜欢在广播声中醒来。我庆幸终于从噩梦中醒来了。

He lives 3 miles away from here.I hope to get away early in the morning.He lives in retirement, away from everyone.I tried to keep the child away from the pool.Far away in the distance, a train whistled.We stand on the top of the dam, casting our eyes far away.The baby is sleeping away quietly.I found him working away in his office.She looked away as peach flooded her cheeks.The radiance of the sunset died away.The sound fainted away in the distance.The neighbors are away.The city is miles away.The count is three and two with two away in the seventh.They lost all their away matches.
他住在距离这里三英里的地方。我希望一早就动身离开。他远离大家隐居着。我设法使孩子远离水池。远处有一列火车鸣笛。我们站在大坝的顶上往远处看。那婴儿一直安静地睡着。我发现他一直不停地在办公室里工作。她双颊泛出红晕,视线转向别处。夕阳的余辉渐渐地消失了。声音在远处渐渐消失了。邻居不在家。这个城市在几英里之外。现在是第七局，两好球三坏球，两人出局。他们输了所有的客场比赛。

Don't you think the radio's a bit loud?Your copy of the dictionary is looking a bit the worse for wear.His ideas on this subject are a bit foggy.These trousers are a bit tight.I feel a bit rough I'm going to bed.An airmail letter to china normally cost50 cents, but this letter seem a bit thick.It's a bit fresh this morning, isn't it?The dish tastes a bit sweet.
你觉得收音机的声音是不是太吵了点？你这本词典看来有点儿太旧了。他对这个问题的看法有些模糊。这条裤子有点儿紧。我有点儿不舒服－－想去睡觉了。寄往中国的航空信一般是50美分，不过这封信好像厚一点。今天早晨有点儿凉丝丝的吧？这菜有点儿甜味。

There was a slight quiver in his voice as he spoke.The wooden floor has a noticeable slant.She juiced a few oranges for her breakfast.Several nations formed a defense league.A few anatomic mysteries remain unsolved.In the morning the storm relented a little.
他说话时声音有些颤抖。这木地板可以看得出有些倾斜。她拿几个橙子榨汁当早餐饮料。几个国家结成了防御联盟。一些结构上的疑点仍未解答。早晨大风暴减弱了一些。
He had given this question a great deal of thought.We lost a lot of money on that deal.They eat a great deal of fruit in addition.The concert drew a large audience.
他对这个问题做过许多思考。我们在那笔交易上亏损了许多钱。他们还吃大量的水果。音乐会吸引了大量的观众。
A wren is a kind of short-winged songbird.I want a kind of glass dish that resists heat.He was a bit tipsy,reeling along the street.He has some share of his father's genius.
鹪鹩是一种短翼的鸣禽。我想要一种耐热的玻璃盘。他已有几分醉意，沿大街蹒跚而行。他有几分承自父亲的天赋。

translation: 总而言之；头等重要的东西
examples: He has his faults, but, all in all, he is a good helper.All in all, he's more learned than he was ten years ago.The necklace was all in all to that little girl.Grammar is not all in all in learning a foreign language.
